mapper.update: UPDATE tasks t1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT id FROM tasks WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_id = #{id} ) t2 ON t1.id = t2.id SET t1.hidden = TRUE
mapper.select: select t.id, t.title, t.description, t.start_date, t.end_date, t.status, t.priority, t.estimate_hours, t.parent_id, t.project_id, p.name AS project_name, COUNT(sub.id) AS number_subtasks, t.employee_id, CONCAT(u.first_name, ' ', u.last_name) AS employee_name, t.completion, t.employee_review, t.manager_review, e.manager_id from tasks t LEFT JOIN projects p ON t.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN users u ON t.employee_id = u.id LEFT JOIN employees e ON t.employee_id = e.id LEFT JOIN tasks sub ON sub.parent_id = t.id WHERE t.parent_id = #{parentId} AND t.hidden = FALSE GROUP BY t.id
